ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Just made level 26!
ygData.msgSnippet: Charm only acts as a mem blur about 70-80% of the time.  It s not foolproof. ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Charm only acts as a mem blur about 70-80% of the time. It's not foolproof.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 7:01 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Just made level 26!


> your charm is a mem blur in that it erases the damage list, so go ahead
and
> beat on it til just before it dies, charm it, then let him kill it. he
> doesn't have to mem blur.
>
> Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L49 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
> > I then beat on it,
> > till three quarters dead (or keep it charmed so the
> > other ppl cant steal it...) and then my friend mem
> > blurs it and finishes it off.. Really slow because he
> > keeps giving the orcs away, so ppl wont think we are
> > ks'ing
>
